about_the_game:
Xiao Ke-Ling Diao's Winter Uniforms Clothing Includes [Fine Clothing] Xiao Ke-Ling Diao's Winter Uniforms
The shape is like bright moon and Yun He, the body is like light wind and moving wave. ※
Winter uniforms for female psychic detectives issued by psychic investigation administration. ※.
Fashion design of academic style, even in cold winter, can make spirit exploration fresh and vivid as spring breeze and lovely. ※.
Gift of 19,999 Lingbi with clothing.
